General.Description: ChainLink is building to be off-chain resources like data feeds, APIs. It is a blockchain-base platform, it is not only cryptocurrency smart contracts but also the bridge to connect users around the world. By the ERC20 token, ChainLink can connect and communicate with external resources on their own. Based on the Ethereum Blockchain, LINK allows Smart Contracts to pay any kinds of tranference.
General.Features: ChainLink can connect the users by the off-chain data. It is also considered as the best way to connect the users to the world and make the smart contracts secured. The smart contracts were developed by many developers and encountered the connectivity problem.
General.Technology: From off-chain data feeds, the LINK Network operators can format of data into blockchain to readable formats. Moreover, the guarantees are also provided with data, bank payments and access to APIs. For more than 3 years, the secure oracles for Bitcoin and Ethereum has been developed to connect smart contracts on various networks thanks to off-chain systems.
